She Golden on my Whale 'till I Treasure Island.

Published: May 10, 2025 12:45 pm

In the latest update of Fisch, the developers introduced a new landmark in the Second Sea called Treasure Island. This island is different from other points of interest because it doesn‚Äôt show up on your screen with markers. Instead, it‚Äôs a secret location that you can only reach by using the Golden Whale. If you‚Äôre interested in finding out how to get there and what to expect, this Treasure Island location guide will walk you through everything you need to know.

Table of Contents

  • Crazy Man NPC Location in Fisch
  • Golden Whale Spawn Location in Fisch
  • How to leave Treasure Island in Fisch

Crazy Man NPC Location in Fisch

First, you‚Äôll need to find a character in Fisch known as the Crazy Man NPC. He‚Äôs located on the Isle of Beginning in the Second Sea. To reach him, get on your boat and sail directly to the GPS coordinates (X:-371, Y:80, Z:-347). When you arrive, look for an older man with a bald head standing near the shoreline. This is the Crazy Man. Talk to him, and he‚Äôll tell you about a mysterious place called Treasure Island. He‚Äôll also mention that you can get there with the help of the Golden Whale, which shows up near the island.

Golden Whale Spawn Location in Fisch

Normally, the Golden Whale won‚Äôt be visible because it only shows up during Tornado Weather. So, you‚Äôll need to wait until the weather changes. Once you notice the tornado weather has started, go back to the island. You should see the Golden Whale near the edge of the island. After that, talk to the Crazy Man NPC again. This time, he‚Äôll tell you to get on the Golden Whale with him.

Right after you board the Golden Whale, you‚Äôll be taken inside its interior. You‚Äôll stay there for about five minutes while the whale travels to Treasure Island. During this time, you have a couple of things you can do. You can try catching rare fish from the pool found inside the whale, or you can visit the Merchant inside and buy some bait to help with your fishing.

When the five-minute timer inside the whale ends, you‚Äôll arrive at Treasure Island in Fisch. On this island, you can catch special types of fish that aren‚Äôt found anywhere else. You also have the option to buy the Treasure Rod, which can help with fishing. If you have any items you‚Äôre curious about, you can take them to the Treasure Appraiser to learn more about their value or purpose.

How to leave Treasure Island in Fisch

You can always exit Treasure Island in Fisch using the same Golden Whale that helped you reach the island in the first place. The Golden Whale will be present on the northern edge of the Treasure Island map near the Crazy Man NPC, as shown in the above image.
